reviews.text: Excelente servicio y atencion de la Manager Danna Hidalgo ..nos recibieron con una sonrisa , buen trato y amabilidad del staff..nos resolvieron preguntas sobre los sanwichs y papitas muy rico con sus salsas...Atencion A1..los recomiendo 100%.

First time. Chicken sandwich and macaroni.
Pricey at 7$ sandwich and $4 macaroni still a simply delicious and filling meal.
Note : I felt both were Loaded with salt.
Thankyou Shenaya for your wonderful hospitality.
RomÃ¡n is a sweet guy and really nice what a charmer
Manager is very sweet ! Very good customer service ğŸ’•â€¦
The soup and salad was nice in case you look for healthy thing to eat
Great customer service as always! Good food for a reasonable price. Approx. $10/person. Nice bright atmosphere!

First time coming here and it was very nice! Would definitely come here a second time. Came around breakfast time. Asked if they had grilled chicken sandwiches at this hour, and they respectfully said no, theyâ€™ll serve that in lunch hours, starting 10:30. I bought a Chick-Fil-A biscuit, and it tasted SO GOOD! Fully cooked. The Hash Browns tasted great! Crispy and it gives you the delight. The entire store wasnâ€™t busy. But overall, even if it is expensive, you will be able to feel great here and have good food!

This is my favorite Chick Fil A location I ever been to! The table area and floors are always clean. I want to give a special shoutout to Eddie who took my order. Thank you for your great customer service. It does not go unnoticed! Thank you for Aman for sending rewards to my Chick Fil A account from time to time. I don't eat fast food alot because I try to eat healthier but when I see a reward drop in my account from Aman, I go and order other items as well.  Thank you so much! I go to support this Chick Fil A cause I want this place to last in this area. Thank you again.
Chick-fil-A You should be ashamed of yourself with charging $9.00 for ONLY a grilled chicken sandwich, not even with fries or drink. Wow.
This place is peak. They were very mindful about checking their food for my sesame allergy and looked at their allergen sheet. the chicken is very good also
Most disgusting piece of chicken, rubbery and far from fresh.
This actually was my first time eating there chicken sandwich and waffle fries.

I am so appreciative for the service I received at this location. Dereck was very attentive while I was in the restaurant, I had a wonderful experience. I will definitely recommend this location and will revisit soon.

Management should give Dereck a raise ;)
The cashier Eddie is very nice, he gave us a free refill and he offered to take the trash out even though we didn't ask. Very nice customer service, I think you should give him a raise
We love the new pickup and order separations it seems to flow better and keeps the front from being overcrowded with waiting patrons

We will miss all the staff ! ğŸ¤ Iâ€™ve been coming here since they open, pretty sure the stall all know me since i come with my kids every single week ğŸ¤ 2 kids meals of chicken strips , coke zero , and 4 bbq ğŸ¥¹ğŸ¥¹ we love Carmen btw
Good service

I bought tonight a sandwich deluxe, that was approximately $15 and what was the surprise when I got home, the sanwich did not have the chicken inside as it is showing the picture below. I request the refund of my moeny or a gifth card or something.

I always order a Cobb salad and I HAVE NEVER SEEN THEM BEING THIS STINGY WITH THE CHICKEN . TELL ME WHY I SAW LIKE MINIATURE  Pieces OF A TENDER . Literally just get chipotle  13 bucks . Never going back to this location .

Great Great staff located at this Chick fil-a
They make you feel welcoming and my daughter loved it.
Laura especially went above and beyond to make our day. We will definitely be returning.
Chick-fii-A is a good food spot to eat. The spicy chicken deluxe, and the chick-fil-A sauce.

I ordered from the pick-up area half an hour before they close; and the staff Danna, I believe, and her coworkers are really nice, helpful, and super fast. The food was good and warm. Definitely will order pick up more often.
It's ok it's chick fil a

This location is the best ! All staff I encountered with was very polite and well mannered. I really appreciate yâ€™all services ! The morning staff and manger did an amazing job with my son birthday order! ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¾â­ï¸â¤ï¸ thank you once again
What a nice service, workers here are great!!
10 out of 10 service, owner saw one of boys without some eats and brought him some free nuggies and with free breakfast for all 3 of us, great guy overall really love the energy he gave
Excellent service & polite behavior. I love this branch

We were missing a sandwich,  when I went back to collect it, the guy that made it had a weird attitude , I said thank you and he just turn around.
I guess they don't say my pleasure here ğŸ˜….
People hate their jobs so much that is almost sad
Comida rica
the owner or whoever gave out free food to my friends when we didnâ€™t have money shoutout to him ğŸ¥¹
I had a food safety issue on an Uber Eats order on one specific item - strawberry milkshake. Check your milk. It's gone bad and am already sick after just 30 minutes of having it.
Buen servicio, la seÃ±orita fue muy amable y de gran ayuda al momento de ordenar.
Excellent service. Amazing customer service. Very attentive and friendly toward customers. We love chick fil a.  ğŸ’œ

It wasn't busy at the time, workers were nice and service was fast.
But.. $10+ for 12 little bits of nuggets is craazy.

The managers are amazing!!! Congratulations to the owners of this location. I think the workers and a couple mangers are still learning. My order was misheard, they threw away the fries, I had to wait for the Mac and cheese and I had to rebag the corrected order myself.

This was not the highest level of chick fil a service, but still a nice place.

Ive been coming to this location a lot since its the only one in queens  . I had placed a huge order monday . 100$ worth of food . The lady working the mobile order section on baxter said theres a limit / cap to how many sauces theyre allowed to give, this amount first being 18 cause thats what i said i had in the bag . Then 20 because i recounted it . Safe to say ill be keeping an eye out for that specific girl and then the other one who also lied again after . I felt so belittled and disrespected because why cant you give me what i paid for . And btw no such policy exist so Iâ€™m definitely gonna let them have it next time . Long story short , my order was supposed to come with close to 40 sauces but they only gave me 20 because of some apparent policy , theyre liars . Proof is in pixture below , i never complain but they made me so upset when all im trying to do is buy sauce for my family
Excelente
Top shelf ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¿ ğŸ‘ğŸ¿ ğŸ˜ ğŸ‘ğŸ¿

I have been patronizing this location since they opened and almost visit weekly, as I work in the area fairly often. I order via the app ahead of time to pick-up/take-out as I am on lunch break and tick-tock goes the clock. The majority of the time, the staffers are friendly, greet you with a smile, ask whether you are ordering or picking up, ask for the last 4 digits of your phone number and you're good to go! This evening, I entered about an hour before closing, three staffers looked right at me and as I approached the pick-up area on the to-go/late night side, they just walked away. No greeting, no "Hey, we'll be with you in a second.", literally nothing at all. Granted, they were preparing to close, as some folks were moping, but my order was already prepared, and waiting in the pick-up area. There were no delivery app folks or any other customers inside the store...sad to say, I just grabbed my order and walked out. This was the first time this situation occurred here, and it was very questionable behavior from food service employees from an establishment that has a reputation of being top tier in customer satisfaction.
Large location with plenty of seating. If you are planning to dine-in, you can order from the table on a mobile device and the staff will bring the food to you.

Lots of seating space. It is super clean. The order was fresh and hot. Do you need a code to get into the bathroom. But the bathrooms are super clean too. Itâ€™s brand new right now so we will see how it plays out. Someone needs to wipe down the tables.

This location in Jackson Heights is one of the cleanest locations Iâ€™ve ever been to. I asked the cashier when did this location open and he said that they have been there for a little over two years and you honestly cannot tell at all.

A lot of the Chick-Fil-A locations down in the south are very dirty and doesnâ€™t live up to the expectations you would have. This location however, was completely different. I would definitely come back to this location. It is a nice quiet environment with a lot of tables and space to sit. I would even have a nice study session here.

Keeping it real out here in Jackson Heightsss
Didn't expect to see a Chick fil a in JH but definitely a pleasant surprise. Always respected the company mission and practices. Employees were super pleasant,â€¦

The food at  chick fil A is always excellent. I had the chicken biscuit meal with a sun joy. This restaurant is always clean and looks nice inside. The customer service is A++. I definitely would recommend this restaurant to family and friends. Ordering from a mobile device is very easy.

The service in this location is pretty fast and workers are generous. Whenever I ask for extra topping for my food, they are very kind and giving. The cobb salad with grilled chicken and avocado dressing is my favorite. Only thing Iâ€™ve noticed was that the menu costs more in this location compared to other ones probably due to the busy area. But overall, a nice chickfila with good service.

Love this location! The customer service is always great, they are very kind and friendly. They are very efficient and make it so you are not waiting in line for too long. Everything is always very clean and thereâ€™s a lot of space to dine in. Best Chick-fil-A in nyc in my opinion.

the staff was very friendly and the food was quick for breakfast on a weekday.
this location is very clean and the temperature is just right!

Since I donâ€™t have much time to come by for this amazing new breakfast favorite I hope to bring the recipe home. But hands down,
the chik-fli-a sauce is unique to its brand.

Great place! Super clean and spacious. Their customer service is also very kind and professional. Almost no wait time in line. Have no complaints â˜º You need to show your vaccine card and ID to eat in btw.

Started off great when they just opened but service isnt the same anymore. Ordered fries and a chicken sandwich deluxe and they are both cold. Not even warm! Just cold. Disappointing considering how much I love chick fil a

Didnâ€™t know about this Chick-fil-A gave it a try ordered on 4/9 at 4pm through food delivery service must say the quality was better than their queens center mall location for one the waffle potato fries werenâ€™t soggy or any of theâ€¦
$16.92 spicy Sandwich great but lettuce is black...side salad same issue....who eats these yellow bitter heart of the lettuce????..first and last time ever... customer service was great tho.
A tremendous establishment with the usual fare. Staff is very good and service is quick.

What a shame that this restaurant allows this type of behavior, I went with my son to eat, and while I was waiting for my food, these two women were making too much noise in addition to grinding marijuana on the table as if nothing had happened, the workers were conspicuous by their absence , while they continued making their marijuana cigarette in front of everyone

Eh consumido en este lugar y quiero Reconocer el trato y amabilidad de los chicos .
Atender con una sonrisa siempre es satisfactorio.

En cuanto a la comida Muy bien . Solo las papas no son manejadas adecuadamente por eso se parten .
Pero muy adecuado el lugar y muy familiar y limpio

Me encantoâ¤
Bought an expensive market salad Found a roach in my salad ğŸª³ to thought I give this place a second chance but that is the end.

I often visit this location. Great customer service and fresh food aa always. As I went into the bathroom to wash my hands before receiving my food, the employee came in after me to tidy up the restroom , what she didnâ€™t do was  remove her gloves before going back into the dinner room to clean tables . Hand washing is essential before leaving the restroom especially for employees.

Ordered breakfast on the app about 15 minutes before they stopped serving it. That way it would be ready for me to just grab and leave when I arrived. Turns out they didnâ€™t bother making it because they couldnâ€™t confirm I was on my way because my tracking wasnâ€™t on ğŸ™ƒ imagine my frustration when I get there 25 minutes later after dealing with getting my kids in the car and â€œcity trafficâ€ and couldnâ€™t just pick up my order. The server offered a spicy biscuit to which I politely declined and walked out extremely annoyed. Truly the worst experience Iâ€™ve ever had with this franchise. Why in the world would I order ahead and not want my order made until I arrive? For all of that I would just order on site with a cashier since it shows that it doesnâ€™t save any time to order ahead. Needless to say I added a secondary Dunkin order and shocker, both food orders were ready for me to grab and go by the time I arrived there-and I donâ€™t have tracking on that app either. I did get my refund with them by the end of the day since the order was never filled, I didnâ€™t have to do anything as the cashier explained, it happens automatically. The company needs to do better as a whole with the online ordering if this is the case though. Because again, if Iâ€™m ordering ahead for an ASAP pick up or a specific time with any other fast food establishment, for the ones Iâ€™ve used so far, itâ€™s always ready/almost done by the time I arrive and doesnâ€™t need a tracker. Walmart and BJs are the only trackers and thatâ€™s to simply let them know youâ€™re on the way so they can move your order to a tote or cart and check in when you arrive so they can bring it to you. But that doesnâ€™t mean theyâ€™re trying to shop your 50+ cart while you drive to their store because that would be stupid. And they even shoot you a text letting you know your order is ready for pick up so you donâ€™t bother leaving earlier than needed. Very disappointing Chic, very disappointing.

*update: Iâ€™ve read your response, however, the email address provided to contact directly is invalid as my email got a kickback saying the delivery was a failure as the address is not found (and i clicked the email directly to compose my message). ğŸ™ƒ

I have always experienced phenomenal customer service from chick-fil-aâ€¦until today. I placed a DoorDash order, as usual - and called the location to ask that cheese not be placed on the salad I ordered. Something Iâ€™ve done before with no issue. This very simple request has always been met with accommodation, as I always explain that Iâ€™m allergic to dairy and DoorDash doesnâ€™t allow for certain ingredients to be omitted from the menu items. The manager I spoke to who said her name was Armeena told me this could not be done. She very aggressively asked for the name of the workers that had done this before and said she would report them because it is â€œagainst policyâ€ to modify a menu item from a DoorDash order. She told me to take it up with DoorDash, and that she would not accommodate my request to not put cheese on the salad even if Iâ€™m allergic to dairy. I asked for her name, and told her I would take it up with chick-fil-a customer service instead. I cannot believe how insanely rude and unaccommodating she was, and as a long term chick-fil-a customer this was the opposite of any interaction Iâ€™ve ever had with any employee from chick-fil-a. Very disappointing and even more disheartening that I will be receiving a salad that I cannot consume that I paid for. Not that this matters but my entire order was almost 100 dollars tonight and a simple request to not put cheese on a salad couldnâ€™t be accommodated? Hopefully this can bring a change to how this manager interacts with patrons.
First time seeing a robot bring food to the table. Fun and playful, love it!

Worst service from a chick fil a I have ever seen. Ivette needs some training on customer service. Please do better and treat your customers with respect. Rolling your eyes and being rude for no reason to paying customers is unacceptable. I will not be coming back here. Other chick fil a stores have much better service.

I usually get the same thing, but last night was my first time going to this location and it will be my last time. I ordered a 30 count of nuggets, only to get home and realize there was only 18 nuggets and they were very hard and tastedâ€¦
Great service, little to no wait time, clean eating area. What more can you ask for? Big shout out to Diego behind the cash wrap for hospitality.
